## Portfolio Project Setup

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
	Next.js + TypeScript + React + Tailwind CSS configured for static export to GitHub Pages

- [x] Scaffold the Project
	Run create-next-app with TypeScript, Tailwind, and App Router enabled
	Note: Use lowercase folder names to comply with npm naming restrictions

- [x] Customize the Project
	Configure for GitHub Pages static export, add portfolio structure

- [x] Install Required Extensions
	No extensions required for Next.js projects

- [x] Compile the Project
	Install dependencies and build project

- [x] Create and Run Task
	Create dev and build tasks in tasks.json

- [x] Launch the Project
	Run development server

- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete
	Update README with GitHub Pages deployment instructions
